"A.D.2028/3/27 12:00": "And that completes our tasks for the day. The paperwork keeps piling up as the entrance ceremony draws nearer, doesn't it Hitsugi."
"On top of that, even more is expected of us since we're boarding students."
"But but, thanks to that we get to have the room all to ourselves. Not a bad deal, I guess?"
"Just kidding! Almost got you there, Hitsugi!"
"Hitsugi?"
"PSO2 is just a game. Mother told us so."
"If that's true, does that mean everyone I've met was a fake?"
"Hitsugi?"
"If that's true, then what exactly is Aru? He was brought over here, and we cared for each other. Is that all fake?"
"Hi-tsu-gi."
"No, it's not just Aru... The person who's worried about me, Xiera. <%me> too..."
"Do they really exist..? ...But, that's not what Mother told us."
"Geez, HITSUGI!"
"Uwaah! Ah, Kohri... What's wrong?"
"That's my line! I kept calling and you didn't respond. You haven't finished your work, either."
"..Sorry."
"What's wrong Hitsugi? You've been acting strange lately. It's not like you."
"I'm not myself, huh. Was I acting that strangely?"
"Yup, that's right! It's really unlike you Hitsugi! It's like someone else in a Hitsugi bodysuit!"
"The Hitsugi I know never hesitates or worries about anything! She's the kind of person who makes decisions on the go and never stops!"
"You never cared about what people say about you or the results of your efforts! Always surprising everyone with what you have!"
"Was that from the previous school clubs budget meeting?"
"Nope, during the freshman welcoming meeting."
"Haah... Even so, that just makes me a dictator."
"It's OK for you to be a dictator, Hitsugi. I'm by your side all the time, so I know what you're really like..."
"That's why you need to stop worrying, Hitsugi. I don't want to see you worrying. I want you to keep pushing forward...!"
"Thanks, Kohri."
"You're right, Kohri. All this thinking and worrying isn't me at all."
"Alright, this calls for a change of pace! Hey Kohri, let's hang out tomorrow! We'll bring Aru along and party hard!"
"Yeah!"
"Hitsugi and Kohri... It's great that they trust each other so much."
"I don't have anything like that... I'm sooo jealous..."
"Oh, no! I didn't mean it like that! It's not that I'm lonely! I'm just longing for that feeling, thats all!"
